briefTitle: Comparative Effectiveness of Palbociclib Plus AI Versus Fulvestrant for HR+/HER2- ABC
officialTitle: Comparative Effectiveness of Palbociclib Plus Aromatase Inhibitor Versus Fulvestrant Alone as Initial Endocrine Therapy for HR+/HER2- Advanced Breast Cancer in Chinese Clinical Practice: a Real-world Study
conditions: Hormone Receptor Positive Advanced Breast Cancer
